snippet: Ms. Kelley, previously chief executive of IPG Media Brands North America, is the latest hire from outside journalism as Bloomberg seeks to transform its business under new leadership.
abstract: Bloomberg hires senior advertising executive Jacki Kelley as chief operating officer of its media business; it is latest hire from outside journalism as company seeks to transform its business under new leadership.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Kelley, previously chief executive of IPG Media Brands North America, is the latest hire from outside journalism as Bloomberg seeks to transform its business under new leadership.

headline.main: Bloomberg Hires Jacki Kelley, Ad Executive, for Media Business
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg Names Chief for Its Media Business
